{"step_by_step_thinking": "Given the patient's history of diabetes and hypertension, along with the positive extensor plantar reflex, the most likely cause of the unconsciousness is diabetic coma. Diabetic coma can be caused by both hyperglycemia (diabetic ketoacidosis) and hypoglycemia. To differentiate between the two, it is important to check the blood glucose level. Therefore, the next step would be to check the blood glucose level.", "answer_choice": "D"}
